radiographic_examinations.findings: Cystic changes observed in the fovea.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Cystic changes became ambiguous 2 decades later.
Amplitude of electroretinography (ERG) was attenuated during the 2-decade follow-up.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Subtle foveal schisis in the left eye, structure of retina relatively well maintained.
Diffuse mild retinal degeneration with no pigmentation in both eyes.
